Interface TransformBuildable<T extends TransformBuildable<T>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DrawTransformBuildable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTransform, Circle, Cross, DrawTransform, Image, ImageBuilder, LineString, LineStringBuilder, Rectangle, Shape, ShapeBuilder, Text, TextBuilder
